trans-unit.source: Provides a base class that exposes an element to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 提供基底類別會公開項目加入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: When [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries the root of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] application about an element, the root returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer for that element.
trans-unit.target: 當[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]查詢的根[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]項目的相關的應用程式，會傳回根[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]對等項目。

trans-unit.source: The peer also responds to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] queries about its corresponding element.
trans-unit.target: 對等電腦也會回應[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]其對應的項目相關的查詢。

trans-unit.source: Provides initialization for base class values when they are called by the constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別的建構函式呼叫時，提供基底類別值的初始設定。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> that is reported to the automation client as a source for all the events that come from this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> ，其報告至自動化用戶端，做為所有來自此事件的來源<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> that is the source of events.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>也就是事件來源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key combinations for the element that is associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得快速鍵的相關聯的項目組合[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]對等。

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: 快速鍵。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>

trans-unit.source: If an application responds to keyboard events to provide shortcut key behavior, it should return a string that contains the keyboard shortcut combination.
trans-unit.target: 如果應用程式回應鍵盤事件來提供快速鍵行為，則應該傳回字串，包含鍵盤快速鍵組合。

trans-unit.source: For example, for an element that can copy text to the clipboard, this attached property might be set to the value "CTRL+C".
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以將文字複製到剪貼簿的項目，此附加的屬性可能會設定為"CTRL + C"的值。

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: 快速鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the element that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與自動化對等相關聯項目的存取金鑰。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the access key.
trans-unit.target: 包含便捷鍵的字串。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: An access key (sometimes referred to as a keyboard shortcut or mnemonic) is a character in the text of a menu, menu item, or label of a control such as a button that invokes the associated menu function.
trans-unit.target: 中的功能表、 功能表項目或例如叫用相關的功能表函式的按鈕控制項的標籤文字的字元 （有時稱為鍵盤快速鍵或助憶鍵） 的存取金鑰。

trans-unit.source: For example, to provide a shortcut way to open the `File` menu (for which the access key is typically F), an element might have this attached property set to "ALT+F".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要提供快顯的方式來開啟`File`功能表 （適用於存取金鑰通常是 F），項目可能會有這個附加的屬性設定為"ALT + F"。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the access key.
trans-unit.target: 包含便捷鍵的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the element that is associated with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得項目相關聯的控制項類型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]對等。

trans-unit.source: The control type.
trans-unit.target: 控制項類型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The control type.
trans-unit.target: 控制項類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId*> of the element that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId*>與自動化對等相關聯的項目。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 自動化識別項的值是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: If that property is not set, the value is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定該屬性，這個值是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The identifier.
trans-unit.target: 識別項。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>

trans-unit.source: The value of the automation identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 自動化識別項的值是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A>

trans-unit.source: If that property is not set, the value is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定該屬性，這個值是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> object that represents the screen coordinates of the element that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>物件，代表螢幕座標與自動化對等相關聯的項目。

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 週框。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 週框。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of GetChildren elements that are represented in the UI Automation tree as immediate child elements of the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示在使用者介面自動化樹狀目錄中為自動化對等目的直接子項目 GetChildren 元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 子元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: 子元素的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a name that is used with <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref>, to differentiate the control that is represented by this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得搭配使用的名稱<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref>，若要區別這由控制項<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The class name.
trans-unit.target: 類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: The class name.
trans-unit.target: 類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> on the element that is associated with the automation peer that responds to a mouse click.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>與回應滑鼠 automation peer 相關聯的項目上按一下。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element represents a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>, a clickable point is any point in the visible client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that issues the command that the button represents when it is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果項目代表<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>，可點選的點是可見的工作區中的任何點<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>發行按鈕表示按下滑鼠時的命令。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: A point in the clickable area of the element.
trans-unit.target: 可點選區域中的項目點。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>

trans-unit.source: A point within the clickable area of the element.
trans-unit.target: 項目的可點選區域內的點。

trans-unit.source: Gets text that describes the functionality of the control that is associated with the automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述與自動化對等相關聯控制項的功能的文字。

trans-unit.source: The returned string typically provides the same text that is provided by the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的字串通常會提供相同的文字所提供的工具提示控制項。

trans-unit.source: The help text.
trans-unit.target: 說明文字。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>

trans-unit.source: The help text.
trans-unit.target: 說明文字。

trans-unit.source: Tells [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] where in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree to place the <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""></xref> being hosted by a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.
trans-unit.target: 會告知[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]在何處[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄中放置<xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""></xref>所主控[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]項目。

trans-unit.source: This method returns the hosted `hwnd` to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host `hwnd` objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回託管`hwnd`至[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]控制該主控件`hwnd`物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> that is associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must override this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>立即裝載的項目與相關聯`hwnd`必須覆寫這個方法。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: If this method is not overridden, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] places the `hwnd` as a child element of the <xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource> that hosts the whole application.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個方法不會覆寫，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]放置`hwnd`為的子元素<xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>裝載整個應用程式。</xref:System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you want to override this default behavior and set [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] to position the hosted `hwnd` parallel to the place where it is located in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] logical tree.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您要覆寫此預設行為，並設定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]定位託管`hwnd`平行它所在的位置[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]邏輯樹狀結構。

trans-unit.source: Except in hosting scenarios, do not allow <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> types to override this method.
trans-unit.target: 除非在裝載案例中，不允許<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>覆寫這個方法的型別。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: In addition to overriding this method, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> types that are associated with an element that immediately hosts an `hwnd` must return the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> that is cast to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple> in response to WM_GETOBJECT coming to the hosted `hwnd`.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫這個方法，除了<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>立即裝載的項目相關聯的型別`hwnd`必須傳回<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>轉型成<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>回應傳給主控 WM_GETOBJECT `hwnd`。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: To get a pointer to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>, call <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.HostProviderFromHandle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得的指標<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>，請呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.HostProviderFromHandle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.AutomationInteropProvider.HostProviderFromHandle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple>

trans-unit.source: This method returns the hosted <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""></xref> to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] for controls that host <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回託管<xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""></xref>至[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]控制該主控件<xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnd" name="hwnd" href=""></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets text that conveys the visual status of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示 visual 與此 automation peer 相關聯的項目狀態的文字。

trans-unit.source: For example, the status of a messenger contact might be "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: 例如，「 忙碌 」 或 「 上線 」，可能是 messenger 連絡人的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The status.
trans-unit.target: 狀態。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>

trans-unit.source: The status.
trans-unit.target: 狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes what kind of item an object represents.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述何種項目的物件所代表的字串。

trans-unit.source: Examples of the returned string are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".
trans-unit.target: 傳回之字串的範例是 「 郵件訊息 」、 「 連絡人 」 和 「 文件 」。

trans-unit.source: The kind of item.
trans-unit.target: 項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>

trans-unit.source: The kind of item.
trans-unit.target: 項目的類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref> that is targeted to the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>如<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref> ，目標項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the GetLabeledBy method gets the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果項目，則<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>取得<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>與相關聯</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label></xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>的控制項，GetLabeledBy 方法</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: In the following image, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> "Themes" is targeted to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>; therefore the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> also targets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 在下列影像中， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>「 主題 」 以<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>; 因此<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>也為目標</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>的</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>目標</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>

trans-unit.source: When the user presses **ALT**+**T**, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> gets focus instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按**ALT**+**T**，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>取得焦點，而不是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: ![Display properties shows labeled by usage](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "Display properties shows labeled by usage") The GetLabeledBy method for <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer> returns the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer> for the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>.
trans-unit.target: ![顯示屬性顯示用法所標記的](~/add/media/labeledby.JPG "顯示屬性顯示用法所標記的")<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer>對應<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer> GetLabeledBy 方法

trans-unit.source: This enables an automation client to get the text string that describes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓 automation 用戶端取得文字字串描述<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> </xref>的目標項目的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer"> </xref>的目標項目的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Label"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable localized string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> value for the control that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得人類看得懂的當地語系化的字串，代表<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref>與此 automation peer 相關聯的控制項值。

trans-unit.source: The type of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項類型。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLocalizedControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLocalizedControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLocalizedControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The type of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets text that describes the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述與此 automation peer 相關聯的項目文字。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the derived implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetNameCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetNameCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetNameCore%2A>衍生的實作

trans-unit.source: The name.
trans-unit.target: 名稱。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>

trans-unit.source: You can think of this value as a string that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將此值視為使用者用來說明他們要參考控制項的字串。

trans-unit.source: This property is used by tools such as Narrator to tell the user what the control is.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可由工具，例如 [朗讀程式] 來告訴使用者控制項是什麼。

trans-unit.source: For example, a button with a string "OK" should return "OK".
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用字串 [確定] 按鈕應該會傳回 [確定]。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> control that lets users select a color might return "Colors".
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>控制項，讓使用者選取一個色彩可能會傳回"Colors"。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: Make sure that you have assigned a name to all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that accessibility tools such as screen readers can refer to each control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: 請確定您已在所有的控制項指派名稱[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，讓協助工具，例如螢幕助讀程式可以參考到每個控制項，以當地語系化的方式。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the label.
trans-unit.target: 包含標籤的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the explicit control orientation, if any.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出明確控制方向中，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: The orientation of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的方向。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>

trans-unit.source: The orientation of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的方向。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> that is the parent of this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>也就是這個父<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The parent automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 父自動化對等。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the control pattern that is associated with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得與指定相關聯的控制項模式<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A value from the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 中的值<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface"></xref>列舉型別。

trans-unit.source: The object that implements the pattern interface; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if this peer does not support this interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作模式介面的物件<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>如果這個對等不支援這個介面。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> from the specified point.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>從指定的點。

trans-unit.source: The position on the screen to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> from.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得螢幕上的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>從。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>在指定的點。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called from <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetPeerFromPoint*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫從<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetPeerFromPoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetPeerFromPoint*>

trans-unit.source: The position on the screen to get the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> from.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得螢幕上的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>從。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> at the specified point.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>在指定的點。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer currently has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前是與此 automation peer 相關聯的項目是否具有鍵盤焦點。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目具有鍵盤焦點。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目具有鍵盤焦點。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Triggers recalculation of the main properties of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> and raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged> notification to the Automation Client if the properties changed.
trans-unit.target: 觸發重新計算的主要屬性<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>並引發<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged>自動化用戶端的內容變更時的通知。</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged.PropertyChanged>

trans-unit.source: Examples of main properties include, but are not limited to, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.LogicalChildren%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 主要屬性的範例包括但不限於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.LogicalChildren%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.LogicalChildren%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, updates and notifications happen automatically after the update of the layout in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，更新和通知，會自動在版面配置更新之後[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: (The update occurs in response to the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> event.) Sometimes, however, properties change without raising the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> event.
trans-unit.target: (為了回應進行更新<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>事件。)</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>有時候，不過，屬性變更而不會引發<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>事件。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>

trans-unit.source: For example, when the whole <xref:System.Windows.Window> moves, the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> event is not raised.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當整個<xref:System.Windows.Window>移動，<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated>不會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LayoutUpdated> </xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: In this example, the set of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A> objects change because the objects are expressed in screen coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，一組<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>物件變更，因為這些物件會以螢幕座標表示。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderFragment.BoundingRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Windows.Window> must call InvalidatePeer on its peer on <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Windows.Window>必須呼叫 InvalidatePeer <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.WindowAutomationPeer>其對等節點上</xref:System.Windows.Window>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出與此 automation peer 相關聯的項目是否包含呈現給使用者的資料。

trans-unit.source: A content element contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: 內容項目包含呈現給使用者的資料。

trans-unit.source: An example of a content element is an item in a list box or a button in a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 舉例來說，內容項目是清單方塊中的項目或在對話方塊中的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: You typically use non-content elements (which are also referred to as peripheral elements) to work with the content in a composite control.
trans-unit.target: 您通常會使用非內容項目 （也稱為周邊項目） 搭配複合控制項中的內容。

trans-unit.source: An example of a non-content element is the button in a drop-down control.
trans-unit.target: 非內容元素的範例是在下拉式清單控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a content element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目內容的項目。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a content element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目內容的項目。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element is understood by the user as interactive or as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否了解使用者為互動式，還是做為控制項的邏輯結構的項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目控制項。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is a control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目控制項。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element associated with this automation peer supports interaction.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出與此 automation peer 相關聯的項目是否支援互動。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element supports interaction; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目支援的互動。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the automation peer can receive and send events; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果自動化對等可以接收和傳送事件。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> hosts <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否項目，與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>主機<xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""></xref>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Two examples of elements that host `hwnds` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 裝載元素的兩個範例`hwnds`中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost>

trans-unit.source: These peers must also override <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHostRawElementProviderCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 這些對等也必須覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHostRawElementProviderCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHostRawElementProviderCore%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> hosts <xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>項目，是否與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>主機<xref uid="langword_csharp_hwnds" name="hwnds" href=""></xref>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出項目是否可以接受鍵盤焦點。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element can accept keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目可以接受鍵盤焦點。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element can accept keyboard focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目可以接受鍵盤焦點。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an element is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否項目超出螢幕以外。

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不會指出項目是否可見。

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，項目會顯示在螢幕上，但仍看不到。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果項目但遮蔽其他項目在螢幕上時，它可能無法顯示。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，方法會傳回`false`。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目不在畫面上否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目不在畫面上否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element contains sensitive content.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出項目是否包含敏感的內容。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element contains sensitive content such as a password; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目包含機密內容，例如密碼;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element contains sensitive content; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目包含機密的內容。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this peer must be completed on a form.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出與這個對等相關聯的項目是否必須完成表單上。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element must be completed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果必須完成的項目。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is must be completed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果項目，則必須先完成。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the specified event.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]正在接聽指定的事件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, you call this method before creating the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> that raises the event.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您呼叫這個方法建立之前<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>會引發此事件。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: This method is a performance measure because if [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] does not listen for the event, it does not make sense to create a peer to raise one.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是效能量值，因為如果[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]不會接聽事件，並不合理來建立來引發一個對等。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is static and only answers if a delegate listens for the specified event in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)], not for an event on a specific element.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個方法是靜態的只有答案委派中指定的事件接聽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]，不適用於特定的項目上的事件。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] can create broadcast listeners; therefore the per-element information is irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]可以建立廣播接聽程式。因此每個項目資訊無關。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""></xref> that indicates whether [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] is listening for the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""> </xref> ，指出是否[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]接聽事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref> proxy.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>指定<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"> </xref> proxy。

trans-unit.source: The class that implements <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 實作的類別<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref> proxy.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>指定<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"> </xref> proxy。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IRawElementProviderSimple"></xref>指定<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 自動化對等。

trans-unit.source: The proxy.
trans-unit.target: Proxy。

trans-unit.source: Called by the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> to raise the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AsyncContentLoadedEvent"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 由呼叫<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>引發<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.AsyncContentLoadedEvent"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises an automation event.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件，自動化。

trans-unit.source: The event identifier.
trans-unit.target: 事件識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Raises an event to notify the automation client of a changed property value.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件通知自動化用戶端的已變更的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The property that changed.
trans-unit.target: 已變更的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The previous value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 先前的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The new value of the property.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的新值。

trans-unit.source: Synchronously resets the tree of child elements by calling <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore*>.
trans-unit.target: 藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildrenCore*> ，以同步方式重設子項目的樹狀結構

trans-unit.source: Use this method in certain peer implementations that change the set of child elements in response to a call to a control pattern interface.
trans-unit.target: 在某些變更的控制項模式介面的呼叫的回應中的子項目集合的對等實作中使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: An example is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider>, which can change the child elements of the peer by moving the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>.
trans-unit.target: 範例是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider>，它可以變更移動<xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.TextRange>對等的子元素</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITextProvider>

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard focus on the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 與此 automation peer 相關聯的項目設定鍵盤焦點。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>
